We could not be happier with Nate and his crews.  Nate helps me to easily pick colors (my most hated task) with pictures and communicates clearly on schedules so we can plan around locking the dogs in and being home when needed. Nate Freeman and his talented crew exceeded our expectations on the build of our new patio cover. We have a very complex patio, roof and pool layout and received numerous quotes and advice on how we should build our patio cover. Before … More Response from the owner 3 years ago Thank you so much! We really appreciate the feedback and we was Honored to work for yall..

Nate was extremely helpful in getting my new roof installed before I closed on my house. He added, at my request, new gutters in a wonderful color that transitions from the onyx roof and the cement colored Hardie siding.
